jumbotron.title: First Impression
jumbotron.description: Get real-time feedback for your idea

overview.title: The 4 element of 'First Impression'
overview.subtitle: Cheer up, Startup!
overview.allfree_desc: No problem even if you don't have enough money for user interview
overview.realtime_desc: Good for brushing up / pivot concept
overview.gender_desc: Result is shown for each gender and generation.

background.title: Most popular reason startup company is over
background.subtitle: Do you know?
background.caption: 42% of startup company over due to 'No market needs'. Even though their product is good quality, there must be customers they want the product.

usecase.title: Use case
usecase.concept_title: Check your concept with end users
usecase.concept_desc: When you come up with good idea, check it with end users immediately. You never fail to create good products with evaluated user needs.
usecase.favorite_desc: 'Which is prefered by end users, A or B?' You would check such kind of simple question easily.
usecase.segment_title: Check tendency for each generation and gender
usecase.segment_desc: You can check tendency for each segment since this service shows result for each generation and gender

start.title: 3 Steps to start test
start.ask_desc: Question is A/B test. Then 30 seconds to ask question!
start.wait_desc: Let you know when we get answers

download.title: Download app and get started now!
